mapper.select: SELECT t_power.power_name from t_role,t_role_power,t_power WHERE t_role.role_id = t_role_power.rp_role_id and t_power.power_id=t_role_power.rp_power_id and t_role.role_name=#{roleName}

SELECT t_role.role_id, t_role.role_name,group_concat(t_power.power_name) from t_role LEFT JOIN t_role_power on t_role.role_id = t_role_power.rp_role_id LEFT JOIN t_power on t_power.power_id=t_role_power.rp_power_id WHERE t_role.role_bo = 1 GROUP BY t_role.role_name

SELECT t_role.role_id, t_role.role_name,group_concat(t_power.power_name) as power_name from t_role LEFT JOIN t_role_power on t_role.role_id = t_role_power.rp_role_id LEFT JOIN t_power on t_power.power_id=t_role_power.rp_power_id
t_role.role_bo = 1
and t_role.role_name like concat(#{roleName},'%')
and t_power.power_name like concat(#{permission},'%')
GROUP BY t_role.role_name
